I would try to find ways to communicate with others, as this would be crucial for survival. I would look for ways to signal or send messages to others, such as using smoke signals or creating a fire.
I would try to understand the customs and social norms of the time period to avoid offending others and to better navigate the society.
I would try to find ways to adapt to the technology of the time period, such as learning how to use tools or weapons, and how to navigate the transportation methods.
I would try to find ways to stay healthy, such as finding clean water sources and learning how to treat illnesses or injuries.
I would try to find ways to make a living, such as finding a job or starting a business, to provide for myself and others.
